description:
Everything’s different when Asahi wakes up the next morning. Regardless of how he feels, it’s time to face reality.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Hayai no mo Kirawareru kedo, Ososugiru no mo Iyagararenzo
People Don`t Like It If You`re Early, but They Hate It If You`re Late Too
早いのも嫌われるけど, 遅過ぎるのも嫌がられんぞ
